Built-in Clothes Sorter: Integrating a clothes sorter into the laundry basket can save time and energy as clothes can be sorted automatically in one step.
Wheels and Maneuverability: The laundry basket can be made more portable with wheels and handlebars to make it easier to move around.
Built-in Ironing Board: The laundry basket can have a built-in ironing board which can be folded down and used whenever ironing needs to be done at home.
Smart Features: Introducing smart features like Wi-Fi connectivity and sensors can track laundry progress and notify users when laundry is done.
Expandable Design: The laundry basket can be made expandable for increased capacity as needed, such as adding an extendable shelf or extra compartments.
